reporting-org.narrative: AVT-L Association of Victims of Terrorism Lebanon

description.narrative: The goal of this meeting is to understand the good practices (and lessons learned) in the role of victims of terrorism in society to support their efforts to speak out, share messages, and lend their voices. It is essential that lessons learned and good practices are shared and documented, so that experiences can be crosscutting, support to victims can be strengthened, and good practices can be molded to other national experiences and contexts.

participating-org.narrative: AVT-L - Association Libanaise des victimes du terrorisme

activity-date.narrative: 2 days workshop for 15 Lebanese victims of terrorism conducted through 2 topics: 1- The State and the victims of terrorism: the current situation of victims in Lebanon. Their rights, their needs and the challenges ahead.

2- The United Nations and the victims of terrorism: International status, victims’ rights and the role of the United Nations in supporting victims of terrorism around the world. Difficulties and challenges.
